abstract: John Mayer has undergone surgery to remove an inflamed growth on his vocal cords that forced him to cancel several concerts and postpone the release of a new album.
snippet: John Mayer has undergone surgery to remove an inflamed growth on his vocal cords that forced him to cancel several concerts and postpone the release of a new album.
lead_paragraph: John Mayer, the singer and songwriter, has undergone surgery to remove an inflamed growth on his vocal cords that forced him to cancel several concerts and postpone the release of a new album, he wrote on his Tumblr blog.

headline.main: Surgery Forces Mayer to Cancel Concerts and Postpone His Album
